Package gameinterface

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorDialogBox
    A modal dialog box that pops to ask the user to input a color using a color wheel
    ColorFieldPanel
    A property field for Color.
    ControlPanel
    Part of the game window responsible for interacting with the game.
    ElementDetailPanel
    This class is used to display the details of an element.
    ElementManagerToolBar<T extends Element>
    Create an element manager as a tool bar.
    GameFrame
    This class manages the display of the whole game in its own window
    NodalEditor
    The controller class for nodal editors.
    NodalEditorBuilder
    A class with only static methods, meant to build the standard node editors we use in the software.
    PropertyFieldPanel
    The property field class is a panel where a property is represented among sied a JLabel that displays the property name This class should be used as it but should be derived depending on the property type you want.
    SpeciesDetailPanel
    Derived class to display all the properties of a species
    SurfaceDetailPanel
    Derived class to display all the properties of a surface
    TerrainManagerToolBar
    Create an terrain stack manager as a tool bar.
    TerrainVisualizerPanel
    Complete visualizer of the layers of a terrainStack.
    TextFieldPanel
    A property field for text that can be edited.
    TextFixedFieldPanel
    A property field for a NON editable text.
    WorldPanel
    This class manages how the world will be displayed.
